text: Hi, I’m Francis,
the host of this show "Cooking with Dog."
For those who don’t like the egg yolk in previous Milk Seki,
we will be making a delicious and healthy drink with matcha and soy milk.
This is great in the hot season.
First, dilute the matcha green tea powder
with a small amount of hot water.
Stir to mix.
And let it sit to cool.
Now, let’s make the matcha soy milk seki.
In a blender, add the soy milk,
vanilla extract,
dilluted matcha,
sliced banana
and your favorite type of syrup or honey.
Add the 3 ice cubes.
Cover with a lid.
Pulse several times and then blend the mixture
until the ice breaks into small pieces.
Spoon the matcha ice cream into the blender.
Pulse 2 or 3 times.
Now, it is ready.
Pour the matcha soy milk seki into a glass.
Sprinkle on the matcha powder.
And garnish with the granola.
A tip to making this recipe is using ripe bananas,
which have a strong aroma and considerable sweetness.
The combination of the small amount of ice cream, matcha and soy milk is very delicious!
If you're not a fan of soy milk,
we recommend adding a dash of vanilla extract
to mask the flavor of the soybeans.
Good luck in the kitchen!
